title: Anno's Spain
description: The imaginative Anno takes us through Spain in his newest journey book, with wordless spreads that depict the enchanting cities and historical eras of this intriguing country. Discover memorable moments, hidden literary and artistic details, and, of course, discover Anno himself, as he wanders the unfolding countrysides of a land rich in architectural and environmental beauty. Mitsumasa Anno is well-known as one of the international greats in childrenâ€™s literature. Enthusiasts, new friends and old, will be eager to join him on this armchair trip through Spain.
author: Mitsumasa Anno
